title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the MetaphysicalConceptVisualizer, including the types of metaphysical concepts to be supported, the desired visual representations, and the expected functionality.

title: Design Knowledge Graph Structure
description: Define the structure and schema of the knowledge graph that will represent the metaphysical concepts and their relationships.

title: Implement Knowledge Graph Management
description: Develop the backend components for creating, updating, and querying the knowledge graph.

title: Design Visual Representation Engine
description: Define the algorithms and techniques for generating visual representations of metaphysical concepts based on their relationships in the knowledge graph.

title: Implement Visual Representation Engine
description: Develop the components responsible for generating and rendering the visual representations of metaphysical concepts.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for interacting with the MetaphysicalConceptVisualizer, including features for exploring the knowledge graph and customizing visual representations.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the application follows best practices for secure coding, data protection, and user authentication/authorization.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the application, including user guides, developer documentation, and maintenance procedures.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the application meets the defined requirements and quality standards.
